teams.name: Team A
teams.description: Our first team competes in Division 3 and has been a powerhouse this season. Known for their aggressive serving and solid defense, Team 1 has consistently dominated their matches.

teams.name: Team B
teams.description: Our second team also plays in Division 3 and has shown remarkable progress this season. With a mix of experienced players and promising talent, Team 2 has risen to the top of the league.

sections.title: Humble Beginnings
sections.content: In 2022, we stepped onto the Korpen courts with an incomplete team and big dreams. Facing tough odds, we trained with other teams and clawed our way to a mid-table finish. But that was just the warm-up.

sections.title: Rising to the Challenge
sections.content: Fueled by ambition, we set our sights on the Korpen championship. We welcomed new talent, doubled our training, and dominated the league. One loss couldn't stop us from claiming the title.

sections.title: Aiming Higher
sections.content: With the taste of victory, we hungered for more. Our goal? The Swedish Volleyball Championship. We chose the hard path - creating our own club. With Ragsved If's support, we made it happen.

sections.title: Growth and Expansion
sections.content: We recruited dedicated coaches, formed a second team from our toughest Korpen rivals, intensified training to twice weekly, entered two teams in Division 3, and maintained our Korpen roots for fun and fresh talent.

sections.title: Where We Stand
sections.content: Today, we're a force to be reckoned with: Two teams competing fiercely in Division 3, a Korpen team keeping our grassroots spirit alive, and rigorous training pushing us to new heights.

sections.title: Our Mission
sections.content: Our goal is clear: top Division 3 and ascend to Division 2. We're not just playing volleyball; we're building a legacy. From Korpen underdogs to Division 3 contenders, our journey showcases the power of determination and teamwork. We've come far, but this is just the beginning. Watch us rise.
